author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering of the PSG College of Technology has opened a Centre of Excellence in Solar PV (photovoltaic) Systems recently. A release said that the department had started with the centre in association with PRO Sun Energy Pvt. Ltd.

The objective of the centre was to create an awareness on the importance of solar PV systems among people so as to reach the target of generating 100 GW from solar PV installations in the country by 2020.

The centre that had an in-house research and training facility would focus broadly on education and research in solar PV, the release said and added that the centre would offer various courses too.

The centre would soon develop an automatic solar panel cleaning system that would boost solar panels’ efficiency by 12 per cent, the release added.

The college principal, R. Rudramoorthy, and the correspondent, L. Gopalakrishnan were present during the inaugural function.
title: Centre for excellence opened
